synthesis_conditions.mixture_ratio: 1:1 mixtures of the molecular clip A and linkers 1-9
synthesis_conditions.crystallization_method: pentane diffusion into CH2Cl2 crude solutions

synthesis_conditions.description: tetracationic metallacycle resulting from the coordination of two equivalents of the short FA linker 1 to two molecular clips A
synthesis_conditions.structure: compact discrete cyclic assembly without free space or guest molecules inside the metallacycle

synthesis_conditions.description: 1D CPs obtained selectively when linkers 2 and 3 were treated with A
synthesis_conditions.structure: zig-zag 1D CPs with coordination at two consecutive CuI2(B)2 fragments by two linkers having a relatively divergent orientation

synthesis_conditions.description: discrete “open” tetrametallic supramolecular assembly obtained with linker 4
synthesis_conditions.note: Attempts to force full substitution of the acetonitrile ligands of the CuI metal centers of A by treating it with a large excess of ligand 4 always resulted in the isolation of derivative 13 upon crystallization.

synthesis_conditions.description: obtained from the reaction of A with linker 5

forms.14a: 1D CP with 'gauche' conformation and divergent relative orientation of aliphatic fragments
forms.14b: compact metallacycle with mostly parallel aliphatic fragments in an 'eclipsed' configuration

synthesis_conditions.yield: nearly equal amounts and in overall good yield

synthesis_conditions.description: compact metallacycles obtained selectively from linkers 6, 7, and 8 respectively

structure.15 and 16: aliphatic fragments mostly parallel with a gross 'eclipsed' configuration
structure.17: aliphatic backbones present a roughly 'gauche' configuration with opposite orientations toward the center of the metallacycle, including a narrow cavity

synthesis_conditions.description: 1D CP formed selectively with the NC@(CH2)12@CN ditopic linker 9
synthesis_conditions.structure: comparable organization to assemblies 11, 12, and 14a but with extended solid-state organization forming dimers in the solid state

synthesis_conditions.description: new discrete compact supramolecular assemblies obtained by treating bimetallic preassembled CuI precursors E and F with linkers 6 and 4 respectively

structure.19: similar organization to the free precursor E with comparable metric parameters to assembly 15
structure.20: comprises three FA linkers 4 and two CuI2(dppm)2 fragments, each linker coordinated to one metal center of each of the CuI2(dppm)2 fragments
